appDescription.message: RavenDOI allows you to change DOI numbers into clickable links to any site such as sci-hub for example.

firstPartUrlOnPopupView.description: The message for the first part of the URL on the popup view.

CorrectBaseUrlMessage.description: Message for a good formatted base URL.

IncorrectBaseUrlMessage.message: This URL is not correctly formatted
IncorrectBaseUrlMessage.description: Message for a wrong formatted base URL.
